description: portrait of Joannes Schneidewinius enclosed in an oval with inscriptions above and below image
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

around image in black: [ JOANNES SCHNEIDEWINIUS JURIS CONSULTATUS/ Stolberga natus in Turingia/ Anno 1519/ Obijt Servesta Apoplexia/ Anno 1568/ Multa forum plus aula tibi schola plurima debit:/ Ætatis nostræ fama, sequentis amor *E c3] in image in black right center: [RB]; on sheet in pencil: [1-196]
title: Portrait of Joannes Schneidewinius
